data.message: Jesus Christ.... This whole "Trump and Eminem fanboy" bullshit is getting old.... If you don't like him anymore, fuck off. If you do, please... Stay a while. Comment and such. I voted for Trump. I think he's definitely not one of the top choices MY list. That's for sure, but I'm still liking and listening to Em'. Regardless of his views. #RealEminemFan #FuckPoliticsInGeneral

replies.message: Here at least you don't live where I live, am from Belfast Northern Ireland, do I need to say anymore on that lol xxx
